thread.title: National Video Marketing Releases I Love Florida Fishing Podcast In October 2015
thread.title_full: National Video Marketing Releases I Love Florida Fishing Podcast In October 2015

title: National Video Marketing Releases I Love Florida Fishing Podcast In October 2015
text:
National Video Marketing Releases I Love Florida Fishing Podcast In October 2015 
National Video Marketing releases advance information on the upcoming launch of its new I Love Florida Fishing Podcast service. Featuring top Florida fishing charters, guides,resorts, hotes and restaurants. Further information can be found at http://ILoveFloridaFishing.com 
USA , 5 October 2015 -- 
National Video Marketing Releases I Love Florida Fishing Podcast In October 2015 
National Video Marketing National Video Marketing today announced the official launch date of its upcoming I Love Florida Fishing Podcast service. Rumours are already starting to circulate among observers and die-hard fans within the Florida Fishing Tourism world, as the ‘Live’ date of the I Love Florida Fishing Podcast service draws near. National Video Marketing has also released three things fans, reviewers and critics can expect from inception time in October 2015. The first thing folks should expect is a big improvement in the promotion of fishing vacations and tourism in Florida so local businesses in the Florida fishing charter business may increase their marketing ROI. Customers should expect a big increase in online reservations.. National Video Marketing makes this happen by identifying the top local Floridian fishing charters, guides resorts, hotels, restaurants and related marine services in a given locale. Then provides them a venue to illustrate their local expertise in a centralized podcast. The services makes this happen by regionalizing the podcasts for easier search.. This is to be expected from a business who places this much value on helping the fishing tourism industry get real results in marketing online. National Video Marketing places a heavy value on helping local businesses succeed online by overcoming technical barriers to internet marketing and advertising. As well as that, National Video Marketing will be celebrate the live day event by The first ten guest will be provided a free audio expose video to market their fishing charter business and it will be hosted on National Video Marketing’s Youtube Channel http://www.youtube.com/c/IlovefloridafishingPro and private internet marketing and advertising platform.. It is their goal that this will raise the awareness of the Florida Fishing Tourism business and encourage visitors to spread the news of the podcast. It is the hope of National Video Marketing that the I Love Florida Fishing Podcast will be the central reference point for the fishing charter tourism industry.. Finally, for die hard fans of the industry, they’ll be interested to know what went into the creation of the I Love Florida Fishing Podcast service. The podcast has been six months in development from conceptualization to launch and fully implementing the service. Rex Madden, Executive Field Producer at National Video Marketing also wanted to add “A dream without action provides no memories.” For further information about National Video Marketing or the new I Love Florida Fishing Podcast service, it can all be discovered at http://ILoveFloridaFishing.com # # #
